imdb.plot outline: Ivan is a frivolous bachelor, reveling in boundless freedom and lack of family. He understands once that he needs comfort. Therefore, he is decided on a very extravagant adventure. Ivan places an advertisement about finding servants. A bachelor is looking for a resident who will clean up in the apartment, cook in exchange for living in a free room and create coziness. Ivan considers his decision absolutely ingenious. But whether it will be so, only impartial time will show.
imdb.title: Intim ne predlagat
